Critical issues like slow order execution and missing position displays in option trading are leading to losses.

Users also note missing data (e.g., MF holdings, historical data) and UI usability issues.
High brokerage fees, new minimum charges, and unexpected fees cause dissatisfaction.
Users seek better transparency and explanation for all charges.

Evaluate and roadmap key UI/UX improvements like advanced charting tools and integrated stop-loss on charts.

note_markdown:
# Weekly App Review Pulse (2025-11-23â€“2025-12-05)

## Top Themes
*   **Execution & Performance:** Users report frequent app crashes, unresponsiveness, and data inaccuracies. Critical issues like slow order execution and missing position displays in option trading are leading to losses.
*   **UI & Feature Gaps:** Requests for advanced charting tools, indicators, and integrated stop-loss on charts are high. Users also note missing data (e.g., MF holdings, historical data) and UI usability issues.
*   **Charges & Transparency:** High brokerage fees, new minimum charges, and unexpected fees cause dissatisfaction. Users seek better transparency and explanation for all charges.

## User Voice (Quotes)
*   "many times in option trading after taking a trade, position doesn't show for a long time and due to this we get losses and losses."
*   "it is very annoying to have clicked some buttons accidentally causing unintended activation of services."
*   "too much charges and taxes. if you get 100rs profit 50-60rs will be taxes while buying and for maintaining and for even selling the stocks!"

## Action Ideas
*   Prioritize critical bug fixes for app stability, live data, and order execution, especially for option trading flows.
*   Evaluate and roadmap key UI/UX improvements like advanced charting tools and integrated stop-loss on charts.
*   Enhance transparency on all charges; improve in-app fee communication and review the impact of minimum brokerage.
